name: 林正釧
objective:
本課程旨在提供學生流體力學之基本概念以及理論介紹。課程內容包含：流體靜力學及動力學、控制體積分析、流場微分分析、無因次化分析、黏性流與邊界層。
This course provides students with the basic concepts and fundamental theories of fluid mechanics. Topics shall include fluid statics, fluid dynamics, control volume analysis, differential analysis of fluid flow, dimensionless analysis, incompressible viscous pipe flows and boundary layers.
schedule:
週次   單元主題 (* 課程內容將視實際上課進度彈性調整)
1. Introduction
2-3. Fluid Statics
4. Elementary Fluid Dynamics- The Bernoulli Equation
5-6. Fluid Kinematics
7-8. Finite Control Volume Analysis
9. Midterm Exam
10 Dimensionless analysis
11-13. Differential Analysis of Fluid Flow
14-15. Viscous Flow in Pipes 
16-17 Flow Over Immersed Bodies
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
作業: 20%
隨堂考: 20% 
期中考: 30%
期末考: 30%
materials: 上課用書: Munson, B. R., Okiishi, T. H., Huebsch, W. W., and Rothmayer, A. P., Fluid Mechanics, 7th Edition SI Version, Wiley, 2013
consultation: 學生可利用 office hours 與老師討論，或使用 email 聯繫討論。
remarks: 課程為實體教學，倘若受疫情影響，將視情況改為遠距教學 (Microsoft Teams)，並彈性調整課程進度。請參考北科 i 學園公佈事項。
